name: Lickitung

attacks.name: Tongue Wrap
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Supersonic
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

flavorText: Its tongue can be extended like a chameleon's. It leaves a stinging sensation when it licks enemies.

strengths: 90 HP is excellent for a Basic
Tongue Wrap does only 10 damage - bypasses Mr. Mime's Invisible Wall

competitiveHistory: Lickitung from Jungle gained notoriety as a counter to Mr. Mime. Since Tongue Wrap only deals 10 damage, it bypasses Invisible Wall (which only blocks 30+ damage). Combined with its high 90 HP and potential Paralysis, Lickitung could slowly chip away at Mr. Mime while surviving counterattacks. It was also used in stall strategies.

rulings.ruling: Tongue Wrap's 10 damage is not blocked by Mr. Mime's Invisible Wall since it's less than 30.
Both Tongue Wrap's Paralysis and Supersonic's Confusion require successful coin flips.
